page.title: 15LIFE 4
page.content: {Thursdays continued.} After that it is our play time and then we move to our second "home base." and we might do art or sewing,painting,project, drawing or gluing.After that it is dinner time and we have our dinner.After dinner we have another playtime and then we go in for some more lessons. At 5 o'clock I go swimming and so I have to leave at half past 4 as it takes about twenty minutes to get to Basingstoke. Today it is my test and I have to swim 10 times round the pool. After my lesson has finished I go and have a Wimpy hamburger and after I have been to the Wimpy Bar we go back to the sports centre and Sonya (My sister) does canoeing. Her lesson takes about an hour and then we go home.
